tls.description: Enable the TLS encryption for LDAP (LDAPS). Default, is `false`.

tls_ca_certificate.description: The TLS CA certificate to trust for the LDAPS connection.

tls_insecure.description: Don't verify the server TLS certificate. Default is `false`.

description.description: Description attribute for the LDAP group.

id.description: The DN of the LDAP group.

ou.description: OU where LDAP group will be created.

block.description: `ldap_group` is a resource for managing an LDAP group.

id.description: The DN of the LDAP group.

ou.description: OU where LDAP group will be search.

block.description: `ldap_group` is a data source for managing an LDAP group.

description.description: Description attribute for the LDAP user.

id.description: The DN of the LDAP user.

name.description: The name of the LDAP user.

ou.description: OU where LDAP user will be search.

sam_account_name.description: The sAMAccountName of the LDAP user.

user_principal_name.description: The userPrincipalName of the LDAP user

block.description: `ldap_user` is a data source for retrieving an LDAP user.
